00045 //
00046 // This class implements a HTTP protocol client.
00047 // It's able to send GET, POST and HEAD requests,
00048 // download stuff to a file or to a qt SLOT().
00049 //
00050 
00051 class KVILIB_API KviHttpRequest : public QObject, public KviHeapObject
00052 {
00053         Q_OBJECT
00054 public:
00055         enum ProcessingType
00056         {
00057                 HeadersOnly,    // Download headers only (HEAD request)
00058                 WholeFile,      // Emit the data as whole file (binaryData() is emitted)
00059                 Blocks,         // Emit the data as blocks (binaryData() is emitted)
00060                 Lines,          // Emit the data as ASCII text lines (the client must take care of decoding the data)
00061                 StoreToFile     // Store the data to a file
00062         };
00063         enum ExistingFileAction
00064         {
00065                 Overwrite,      // Overwrite existing file
00066                 RenameIncoming, // Automatically rename the incoming file
00067                 RenameExisting, // Automatically rename the existing file
00068                 Resume          // Attempt to resume the file (get partial content)
00069         };
00070 public:
00071         KviHttpRequest();
00072         ~KviHttpRequest();
00073 protected:
00074         // data
00075         KviUrl                 m_url;
00076         QString                m_szFileName;
00077         ProcessingType         m_eProcessingType;
00078         ExistingFileAction     m_eExistingFileAction;
00079         void                 * m_pPrivateData;
00080         unsigned int           m_uMaxContentLength;
00081         unsigned int           m_uContentOffset;
00082         QString                m_szPostData;
00083         // status
00084         QString                m_szLastError;
00085         unsigned int           m_uTotalSize;
00086         unsigned int           m_uReceivedSize;
00087         // internal status
00088         QString                m_szIp;
00089         KviDns               * m_pDns;
00090         KviHttpRequestThread * m_pThread;
00091         KviDataBuffer        * m_pBuffer;
00092         bool                   m_bHeaderProcessed;
00093         bool                   m_bChunkedTransferEncoding;
00094         bool                   m_bGzip;
00095         unsigned int           m_uRemainingChunkSize;
00096         bool                   m_bIgnoreRemainingData; // used in chunked transfer after the last chunk has been seen
00097         KviFile              * m_pFile;
00098 protected:
00099         bool startDnsLookup();
00100         virtual bool event(QEvent *e);
00101         void processData(KviDataBuffer * data);
00102         bool processHeader(KviStr &szHeader);
00103         bool openFile();
00104         void emitLines(KviDataBuffer * pDataBuffer);
00105 
00106         void resetStatus();
00107         void resetData();
00108         void resetInternalStatus();
00109 protected slots:
00110         void dnsLookupDone(KviDns *d);
00111         void haveServerIp();
00112 public:
00113         const KviUrl & url(){ return m_url; };
00114         ProcessingType processingType(){ return m_eProcessingType; };
00115         ExistingFileAction existingFileAction(){ return m_eExistingFileAction; };
00116         const QString &fileName(){ return m_szFileName; };
00117         void * privateData(){ return m_pPrivateData; };
00118         unsigned int maxContentLength(){ return m_uMaxContentLength; };
00119         unsigned int contentOffset(){ return m_uContentOffset; };
00120         unsigned int totalSize(){ return m_uTotalSize; };
00121         unsigned int receivedSize(){ return m_uReceivedSize; };
00122 
00123         void reset();
00124 
00125         void setPostData(const QString &szPostData){ m_szPostData = szPostData; };
00126         void setUrl(const KviUrl &u){ m_url = u; };
00127         void setProcessingType(ProcessingType t){ m_eProcessingType = t; };
00128         void setExistingFileAction(ExistingFileAction a){ m_eExistingFileAction = a; };
00129         void setFileName(const QString &szFileName){ m_szFileName = szFileName; };
00130         void setPrivateData(void * ptr){ m_pPrivateData = ptr; };
00131         void setMaxContentLength(int uMaxContentLength){ m_uMaxContentLength = uMaxContentLength; }; //0 means unlimited
00132         // this will work regardless of ExistingFileAction : even if the file doesn't exist
00133         void setContentOffset(int uContentOffset){ m_uContentOffset = uContentOffset; };
00134 
00135         bool start();
00136 
00137         // this is a shortcut for reset()+setUrl()+setProcessingType()+setFileName()+start()
00138         bool get(const KviUrl &u,ProcessingType p = WholeFile,const QString &szFileName = QString());
00139 
00140         const QString & lastError(){ return m_szLastError; };
00141 
00142         void abort();
00143 signals:
00144         void resolvingHost(const QString &hostname);
00145         void contactingHost(const QString &ipandport);
00146         void connectionEstabilished();
00147         void receivedResponse(const QString &response);
00148 
00149         void terminated(bool bSuccess);
00150 
00151 
00152         void status(const QString &message);
00153         void data(const KviStr &data);
00154         void binaryData(const KviDataBuffer &data);
00155         void header(KviPointerHashTable<const char *,KviStr> * hdr);
00156         void requestSent(const QStringList &request);
00157 };

00160 class KviHttpRequestThread : public KviSensitiveThread
00161 {
00162         friend class KviHttpRequest;
00163 public:
00164         enum RequestMethod { Post, Get , Head };
00165 protected:
00166         KviHttpRequestThread(KviHttpRequest * r,
00167                 const QString &szHost,
00168                 const QString &szIp,
00169                 unsigned short uPort,
00170                 const QString &szPath,
00171                 unsigned int uContentOffset,
00172                 RequestMethod m,
00173                 const QString &szPostData = QString(),
00174                 bool bUseSSL = false);
00175 
00176 public:
00177         ~KviHttpRequestThread();
00178 protected:
00179         KviHttpRequest * m_pRequest;
00180 
00181         QString           m_szHost;
00182         QString          m_szIp;
00183         QString          m_szPath;
00184         unsigned int     m_uContentOffset;
00185         RequestMethod    m_eRequestMethod;
00186         QString          m_szPostData;
00187 
00188         unsigned short   m_uPort;
00189         kvi_socket_t     m_sock;
00190         bool             m_bUseSSL;
00191 #ifdef COMPILE_SSL_SUPPORT
00192         KviSSL         * m_pSSL;
00193 #endif
00194 protected:
00195         int selectForReadStep();
00196         bool selectForRead(int iTimeoutInSecs);
00197         bool readDataStep();
00198         bool sendBuffer(const char *buffer,int bufLen,int iTimeoutInSecs);
00199         bool failure(const char *error=0);
00200         bool sslFailure();
00201         bool selectForWrite(int iTimeoutInSecs);
00202         bool connectToRemoteHost();
00203         bool processInternalEvents();
00204         void runInternal();
00205         virtual void run();
00206 };
